member.name: T:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption
member.summary: An enumeration representing all of the options that can be set against a table.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.toggle
member.summary: Activate bootstrap table without writing JavaScript.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.classes
member.summary: The class name of table (default = table table-hover).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.height
member.summary: The height of table.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.undefined
member.summary: Defines the default undefined text.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.striped
member.summary: True to stripe the rows (default = false)

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.sortName
member.summary: Defines which column can be sorted.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.sortOrder_asc
member.summary: Defines the column sort order as assending.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.sortOrder_desc
member.summary: Defines the column sort order as decending.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.iconsPrefix
member.summary: Defines icon set name.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.icons
member.summary: Defines icons that used for refresh, toggle and columns buttons.
member.value: object[] { refresh: 'glyphicon-refresh icon-refresh', toggle: 'glyphicon-list-alt icon-list-alt', columns: 'glyphicon-th icon-th' }

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.columns
member.summary: The table columns config object, see column properties for more details.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.method
member.summary: The method type to request remote data (default = get).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.url
member.summary: A URL to request data from remote site.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.cache
member.summary: False to disable caching of AJAX requests (default = true).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.contentType
member.summary: The contentType of request remote data (default = application/json).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.dataType
member.summary: The type of data that you are expecting back from the server (default = json).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.ajaxOptions
member.summary: Additional options for submit ajax request. List of values: http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.queryParams
member.summary: When request remote data, sending additional parameters by format the queryParams, the parameters object contains: pageSize, pageNumber, searchText, sortName, sortOrder. Return false to stop request (default = function(params) { return params; }).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.queryParamsType
member.summary: Set "limit" to send query params width RESTFul type (default = limit).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.responseHandler
member.summary: Before load remote data, handler the response data format, the parameters object contains: res: the response data (default = function(res) { return res; }

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.pagination
member.summary: True to show a pagination toolbar on table bottom (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.sidePagination
member.summary: Defines the side pagination of table, can only be "client" or "server" (default = client).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.pageNumber
member.summary: When set pagination property, initialize the page number (default = 1).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.pageSize
member.summary: When set pagination property, initialize the page size (default = 10).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.pageList
member.summary: When set pagination property, initialize the page size selecting list (default = [10, 25, 50, 100]).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.selectItemName
member.summary: The name of radio or checkbox input (default = btSelectItem).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.smartDisplay
member.summary: True to display pagination or card view smartly.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.search
member.summary: Enable the search input (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.searchTimeOut
member.summary: Set timeout for search fire.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showHeader
member.summary: False to hide the table header (default = true)

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showColumns
member.summary: True to show the columns drop down list (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showRefresh
member.summary: True to show the refresh button (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showToggle
member.summary: True to show the toggle button to toggle table / card view (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.minimumCountColumns
member.summary: The minimum count columns to hide of the columns drop down list (default = 1).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.idField
member.summary: Indicate which field is an identity field.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.cardView
member.summary: True to show card view table, for example mobile view (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.searchAlign_left
member.summary: Indicate how to align the search input (default = right).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.searchAlign_right
member.summary: Indicate how to align the search input (default = right).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.buttonsAlign
member.summary: Indicate how to align the toolbar buttons (default = right).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.toolbarAlign_left
member.summary: Indicate how to align the toolbar buttons on the left.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.toolbarAlign_right
member.summary: Indicate how to align the toolbar buttons on the right.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.clickToSelect
member.summary: True to select checkbox or radiobox when click rows (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.singleSelect
member.summary: True to allow checkbox selecting only one row (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.toolbar
member.summary: jQuery selector that indicate the toolbar, for example: #toolbar, .toolbar.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.checkboxHeader
member.summary: False to hide check-all checkbox in header row (default = true).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.maintainSelected
member.summary: True to maintain selected rows on change page and search (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.sortable
member.summary: False to disable sortable of all columns (default = true).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.rowStyle
member.summary: The row style formatter function, take two parameters: row: the row record data. index: the row index. Support classes or css.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.rowAttributes
member.summary: Support all custom attributes.
member.value: Function {} (parameters - row: the row record data, index: the row index)

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.iconSize
member.summary: Set the icons size.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showPaginationSwitch
member.summary: Toolbar button to show or hide the pagination.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.TableOption.showLoading
member.summary: Show loading message when table is obtaining data.

member.name: T:System.Web.Mvc.TablePaginationOption
member.summary: Represents the options available for client or server side pagination.

member.name: T:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption
member.summary: An enumeration representing all of the options that can be set against a column.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.radio
member.summary: True to show a radio. The radio column has fixed width (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.checkbox
member.summary: True to show a checkbox. The checkbox column has fixed width (defualt = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.field
member.summary: The column field name.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.title
member.summary: The column title text.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.class
member.summary: The column class name.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.align_left
member.summary: Indicate how to align the column data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.align_right
member.summary: Indicate how to align the column data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.align_center
member.summary: Indicate how to align the column data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.halign_left
member.summary: Indicate how to align the table header.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.halign_right
member.summary: Indicate how to align the table header.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.halign_center
member.summary: Indicate how to align the table header.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.valign_top
member.summary: Indicate how to align the cell data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.valign_middle
member.summary: Indicate how to align the cell data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.valign_bottom
member.summary: Indicate how to align the cell data.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.width
member.summary: The width of column. If not defined, the width will auto expand to fit its contents.

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.sortable
member.summary: True to allow the column can be sorted (default = false).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.order
member.summary: The default sort order (default = asc).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.visible
member.summary: False to hide the columns item (default = true)

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.switchable
member.summary: False to disable the switchable of columns item (default = true).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.clickToSelect
member.summary: True to select checkbox or radiobox when the column is clicked (default = true).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.formatter
member.summary: The cell formatter function, take three parameters: value: the field value. row: the row record data. index: the row index (function).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.events
member.summary: The cell events listener when you use formatter function, take three parameters: event: the jQuery event. value: the field value. row: the row record data. index: the row index (function).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.sorter
member.summary: The custom field sort function that used to do local sorting, take two parameters: a: the first field value. b: the second field value (function).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.cellStyle
member.summary: The cell style formatter function, take three parameters: value: the field value. row: the row record data. index: the row index. Support classes or css (function).

member.name: F:System.Web.Mvc.ColumnOption.searchable
member.summary: True to search data for this column.
